component.name: ZoopPcServer
component.summary: The app facilitates financial transactions in the background using a pinpad, ensuring security and efficiency. Ideal for merchants, it offers an intuitive interface and support for multiple payment methods.

description.p: Our app works by facilitating financial transactions at Zoop quickly and securely using a pinpad. Designed to provide a smooth user experience, it allows payments and financial transactions to be made without the need for constant user intervention.
